org.jcvlib.core

Class ImageArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.core.ImageArray
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageArray64F, ImageArray8I

    public abstract class ImageArray
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all image arrays. Contains values in 3-dimensional space.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeight()
      Return height of array.
      int getN()
      Return number of values into current array (same as getHeight() * getWidth() * getNumOfChannels).
      int getNumOfChannels()
      Return number of channels in current array.
      Size getSize()
      Return size of array.
      abstract double getUnsafe(int x, int y, int channel)
      Return float-point value from interval [0.0, 255.0] of selected channel from selected pixel without position checking.
      abstract int getUnsafe8I(int x, int y, int channel)
      Return integer value from interval 0..255 of selected channel from selected pixel rounded to integer values.
      int getWidth()
      Return width of array.
      abstract void setUnsafe(int x, int y, int channel, double value)
      Set float-point value from interval [0.0, 255.0] to selected channel from selected pixel without position checking.
      abstract void setUnsafe8I(int x, int y, int channel, int value)
      Set integer value from interval 0..255 to selected channel from selected pixel without position checking.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
